name: Kitten Catastrophe
description:
This was a crazy adventure as I have been coding for almost three months and to take part in this event was awesome! It was such a great experience! Even though there are a lot of bugs, my friend and I had fun making this project for the ludam dare.  There was a problem with the screen and the UI elements but anyway, thanks for playing!

One day walking through the city, you are encountered with a box and in it is a cat. There is a note inside the box that says "be warned"! Not fearing the superstitions you take the cat and go home.

The instructions are in game

Obstacles

1. Car- If you hit the engine, you will get blown up

2. Bird - Duck in order to dodge it

3. Dog- Don't come to close to the dog

4. Lights-try to dodge the broken lampposts

My High Score is  159m so see if you can beat that!

WARNING THIS IS A HARD GAME!!
